rules_text:
Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Cleric[/b] | Other Clerics you control get +2/+2.
[b]Rogue[/b] | Other Rogues you control get +2/+2.
[b]Warrior[/b] | Other Warriors you control get +2/+2.
[b]Wizard[/b] | Other Wizards you control get +2/+2.
